game.name: SEARCH ALL - SEASHELLS
game.categories: Single-player, Full controller support, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Is a game in the genre of "hidden object", in which you need to find all the seashells on a large location drawn in the style of "doodling"
game.shortDescriptionEn: Is a game in the genre of "hidden object", in which you need to find all the seashells on a large location drawn in the style of "doodling"

reviewHighlights.text: This is a really short one picture search game. You need to find all 80 of the seashells in the picture to unlock all the achievements. The art style...
Same basis as the other hidden object games, but this one is played a bit differently. In this game you can zoom in and out of the picture to find sma...
